    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Magnetic Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1979)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Aura" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=206" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 64 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 130 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Copper rings spiral around this [steel shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3). Twin electrical probes near the grip can socket into a jar of moderate (or higher leveled) [bottled lightning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=76), which takes 3 Interact actions to install. A loaded magnetic shield can be activated to convert it into an electromagnet. When an activated magnetic shield is raised, the circumstance bonus increases by 1 against attacks made with weapons primarily made of metal. If you use a [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) against a creature attacking you with such a weapon, you also gain a +1 item bonus to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) attempts against that weapon until the end of your next turn. The shield remains charged for 3 rounds, consuming the bottled lightning, and once the reaction has begun it can't be deactivated.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
